mapper.select:
select count(id) from td_user_campaign where 1=1
and region_id=#{regionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
order by level desc
order by level asc

select
,u.uname as u_uname ,d.name as d_name from td_user_campaign c left join td_user u on u.uid= c.uid left join td_district d on d.id= c.region_id where 1=1
and region_id=#{regionId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
order by level desc
order by level asc
